Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>! I was waitin' for
you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Today's our wedding anniversary, so I thought I'd
cook up a big feast for us! C'mon in!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. Did I surprise you?
<PAGE>
This is a super-special celebration for a super-
special day, after all. It's only right to gussy it up
a bit. ♪
<PAGE>
C'mon! Let's dig in before it gets cold.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yaaay! Look at all the yummy food! Happy
anniversary, Mama and Papa! Can we eat now?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy anni-anni...anni-verbary, Mama and
Papa! Let's eat! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are out cold.
Guess they finally got tired of all that running
around.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm glad you liked tonight's dinner, <MYNAME>.
That makes all my bangin' around in the kitchen
worth it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Say, uh...by the way. Do you have the time to
go on a short walk with me?
<PAGE>
Okay, it's not really a walk, it's a date. I mean,
ever since we got married, we haven't had much
alone-time to go on many.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woohoo! Hang on just a minute, I'll go get
ready!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are. The place where we decided we'd
get hitched.
<PAGE>
It's been a long time since then, but it still feels
like it was yesterday to me.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Back then, I thought I loved you so much there
was no way I could love you even more...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But it's weird. Now that we're married, it feels
like I'm still falling for you more and more every
day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, I love you! I hope we get to have
lots more great anniversaries like this together.
♪

Fritz, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. I'm sure today
was a tiring one.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But for now, wash your hands and come sit
down to dinner. It's our anniversary, so I made
something of a feast for us.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrm. Perhaps I made a little much. I guess I got
a bit too caught up in the celebratory spirit and
overdid it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh well. Come, let's eat before it goes cold.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems they've exhausted themselves for the
day. Both <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are
sound asleep.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I think I'm ready to declare today an excellent
day. I'm glad you enjoyed tonight's dinner. We
should celebrate like this again next year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>By the way, <MYNAME>. We have a little time,
so why don't we go on a short date?
<PAGE>
We haven't had the chance to go on many, now
that we've gotten married.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. Shall we be off, then?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here is where we decided we would spend the
rest of our lives together. No other day of my life
has required so much courage of me.
<PAGE>
But somehow, I managed to scrape together
that courage, and now here I am, with you
beside me.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Now I can say with conviction that all my
hesitation and worrying over our age difference
was foolish nonsense.
<PAGE>
I should have simply told you my honest feelings
much, much sooner than I did.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. May there be many
more wonderful anniversaries in our future.

Klaus, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. That's one more
tiring day in the books.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>C'mon in. I kinda went all out today, whipping
up an anniversary feast for both of us.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm glad you liked it. Anniversaries don't come
around every day, after all. No sense in missing a
great cause for celebrating!
<PAGE>
C'mon. Let's dig in before it gets cold.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heh heh. Looks like they've both had their fill of
excitement today.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm really glad you enjoyed dinner tonight,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So, um, say... How'd you like to do something
that I'd really enjoy, this time?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I mean, I think you'd like it too, but uh...how
about we go on a date? We haven't been on one
in ages.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whew! That was exactly the reaction I was
hoping for. C'mon, let's go.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The day we stood here and agreed to marry feels
like forever ago. But at the same time, it's as
fresh in my mind as if it happened yesterday.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Even now that we're married, I still find new
things to love about you every day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>It's funny. I guess there isn't a ceiling to how
much you can love someone. Being married to
you taught me that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So why fight it? I wanna see how deep my love
can go, <MYNAME>, so I hope you're ready.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you.

Raeger, I love you more than anyone in the
whole world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, welcome home. I am sure you
must be tired from your long day.
<PAGE>
As today is our wedding anniversary, I felt a
celebration was in order, so I've prepared a small
feast for us. 
<PAGE>
Come, have a seat.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh. Have I surprised you? I'm happy that
it's to your liking.
<PAGE>
Come, it would be a waste to let all this food get
cold. Let's eat.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
They seem exhausted. No surprise, given how
much they ran around today. Both are sleeping
like, well...babies.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I am very glad that you enjoyed tonight's dinner,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Now then, it is your turn to do something for
me. Heh heh...now what shall I ask you to do?
<PAGE>
Aah, I know. Why don't we go on a little date
tonight? We haven't had a chance to go on
many since we married.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you. Heh heh. How funny.
<PAGE>
I was hoping you would give me an enjoyable
evening, but it looks like you're already enjoying
things even more than I.
<PAGE>
Anyway, shall we go? Tonight, allow me to
escort you wherever you would like.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here is where we made the decision to marry
and dedicate the rest of our lives to each other.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You may laugh at this, but to this day I
sometimes can't help but worry that it's all some
flight of fancy.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>This must be what people mean, when they
speak of worrying that something is "too good
to be true."
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Help me put that baseless worry to rest,
<MYNAME>. Let's once again promise ourselves
to each other, on this most special of days.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I promise you I will stay by your
side, to love and protect you forever.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I hope you will also stay by my side, loving me
and keeping me forever. ...I love you,
<MYNAME>.

Mistel, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Welcome home. I've been
waiting for you.
<PAGE>
It's our anniversary today, y'know. I put together
a big feast for us. C'mon over here and sit down.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I didn't really know what else to do for an
anniversary, so I just cooked up a bunch of
stuff.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I kinda got carried away, actually. Hope you like
it. Anyway, let's dig in before it gets cold.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Looks like they've worn themselves out. It's like
someone just pulled out the batteries.
<PAGE>
Heh. Their sleeping faces are so defenseless and
open. They look so much like you it makes me
laugh. Kids sure do take after their parents.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Glad you seemed to like dinner tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Say, uh...<MYNAME>? Wanna go out on a walk
together?
<PAGE>
Well, okay. Maybe it's not really just a walk but
a...ahem...you know. I mean, we haven't had
time to go out together since we got hitched.
<PAGE>
Argh! Are you gonna make me spell it out? I'm
trying to ask you out on a date! Sheesh! I was
trying not to have to say it.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Geez. There's one part of you that never
changes, huh? Anyway, let's get going.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Remember this spot? It's where we both decided
to spend the rest of our lives together.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>I know I don't exactly have a silver tongue. I cut
stuff short and sometimes don't say things I
should.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>And to be honest, I realize a part of me is
leaning hard on how you just seem to
understand me without me saying much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know that's wrong of me, too. I need to learn
how to say what needs to be said. So that's why
today I'm gonna say it clearly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. I'm glad you decided to
marry me, and I hope we'll always understand
each other, with or without words.

Nadi, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. You've gotta be
bushed from your long day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Today's our anniversary, so I put together a little
celebration dinner for us. C'mon, have a seat.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hope you like it. Let me know what you think
after the meal, okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Anyway, let's dig in before it gets cold.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are sound asleep. I
guess they really got the most out of their day.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm glad you liked the dinner I cooked,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Say, uh...by the way. Do you want to go out for
a walk with me for a little bit?
<PAGE>
We haven't managed to find much time to go
out together after we got married, after all. So,
um, how 'bout we make a date of it?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Great! Let's go, then.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So here we are. This is where we promised each
other to spend our lives together.
<PAGE>
It's been a long time since then, but the image in
my mind is so vivid that it feels like it could've
been yesterday to me.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I guess they're right when they say that time flies
when you're having fun.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LAUGH>Living together with you has been more full of
fun and happiness than I ever imagined, even
then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>...I love you. I hope you'll stick with
me forever.

Kamil, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. I have been
waiting for you.
<PAGE>
Today is our anniversary, so I prepared a
sumptuous banquet dinner for us. Come, have a
seat.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Still, I must admit this is a little plain for so
important a celebration. I would have liked to
make it a grander affair.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But with my level of culinary skill, any more
would be...er, never mind! It was nothing!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Now then, let's eat!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks like all of the food and the playing has
left <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> exhausted.
<PAGE>
Sounds like they've finally fallen asleep. They're
like little angels...when they're like that.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew. Today was truly an excellent day. I'm
glad you enjoyed the meal I prepared. That's only
natural, given all the effort I put into it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Say...<MYNAME>? Today is our anniversary,
after all. How would you like to make it a
memorable one?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oho ho! Well then, how about you go on a date
with me? If you would be so kind as to escort
me, of course.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
G-goodness...! You certainly don't lack for
enthusiasm, do you? Well then, let's be off.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This very place is where we vowed to spend our
lives together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I still remember exactly how your face looked
that day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>The moment you told me your feelings, you
looked more handsome to me than you ever had
before.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So much so that if I had not already loved you, I
would have right then and there. But now...now
I love you even more than I did then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH><MYNAME>, let's stay together, forever. All
right? And no cheating! If I catch you with some
floozy, I'll never forgive you.

Elise, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. Do you know
what day today is?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ohoho! Yes, exactly. It's our anniversary. And I've
made us a special dinner just for the occasion.
Come in and have a seat.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's a very special day for us, so I may have
gone a touch overboard.
<PAGE>
It would be a waste to let it all go cold, so let's
eat up!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Both of them are sound asleep. After all the food
they ate and how much they played, they must
have run out of gas.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today has been a wonderful day. I'm so glad you
liked the dinner I made. It makes all that time in
the kitchen feel well-spent.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Still, today's a very special day. What say we
make some even more wonderful memories with
the rest of it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I propose a little date, just the two of us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We've had a shortage of chances to be alone
together since we got married. Why let this
opportunity slip by?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wonderful. Let's do it, then. Ohoho! I think I'll
leave you guessing as to where we're headed.
Come on.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here is where we bared our hearts and souls to
each other, dramatically to spend the rest of our
lives together.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Just between us, I was so nervous that day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hm? I didn't look it? Ohoho!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>That was because I was trying my hardest to
maintain my calm exterior. Thinking back on it
now, I'm a little embarrassed to say so.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>? I love you. I love you now far, far
more than I did even then.
<PAGE>
I want us to stay together forever, facing the
headwinds of life with all the panache of classic
literature's greatest lovers!

Iris, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>! You've gotta be
bushed, after working so hard today.
<PAGE>
Today's our anniversary, so I kinda went all-out
and cooked up a big anniversary dinner for us.
Wash your hands and have a seat!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I, uh, was thinking back on our wedding day
and how awesome it was all day today, so I
think I might've cooked too much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I hope you'll really like it, but don't force yourself
to eat too much, okay? Let's dig in.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are both totally
spent. I guess they must've played so much,
they wore themselves out.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
I'm glad you liked the dinner I cooked,
<MYNAME>. That makes all the work I put into it
worth it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Today's already been pretty great, but it feels, I
dunno...a little too soon to call it a day, don't
you think?
<PAGE>
So um...i-if you don't mind, how about we
uh...go on a...a date?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I-I mean, we haven't had much time alone
together to go on dates since we got married,
right?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Th-thanks... Well, let's go, then!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Remember here? It's where we decided we were
going to get married.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heehee! It was so long ago, but that moment is
so vivid in my mind, it's like I can see every
detail of the scene.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Back then, just the thought that I could spend
even more time with you than before made my
heart race.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You still make my heart race now, but that
doesn't make me so nervous anymore. In fact, it
fills me with energy.
<PAGE>
I guess it's a sign of how natural it's become, to
have you here with me. It means I can relax,
knowing you're right there.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>...I love you. I hope you'll stay here
with me forever.

Lillie, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. How was your
day?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Today is our anniversary, so I thought we could
celebrate. I made a big anniversary dinner for us
to enjoy.
<PAGE>
Come on, have a seat. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heehee! I wanted to have a big celebration,
because it's a super special day. So...I ended up
making a lot.
<PAGE>
Let's dig in and enjoy!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at both of them, sound asleep there. They
must be all worn out after playing so much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Their sleeping faces are looking more and more
like yours every day. Isn't it amazing how much
children can look like their parents? ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today was a great day. I'm really happy you liked
everything I made for dinner.
<PAGE>
But it feels too early to call it a day, don't you
think?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, I know! How about we go on a little date?
That'd be the perfect way to end our anniversary.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yay! Thank you, <MYNAME>! Come on, let's go.
♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here is where we promised each other we'd
share the rest of our lives together.
<PAGE>
How long has it been since that day? Time really
goes by fast while you're out living life, huh?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>The more time I spend with you, the more I
seem to love you.
<PAGE>
I'm sure tomorrow I'm going to love you even
more than today, and even more the day after
that. I'll bet it'll go on like that forever.
<PAGE>
I hope you'll love me even more day by day,
<MYNAME>. I love you!

Agate, I love you more than anyone in the whole
world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. I am sure your day
must have been a busy one.
<PAGE>
However, I have just finished preparations for our
anniversary party. Please, have a seat.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was worried about how silly I might look if you
had forgotten all about today while I worked so
hard on all this food.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But it seems I needn't have worried. Come, let's
eat while it's still hot.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It seems they've both worn themselves out
playing. They're both sound asleep now.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today was a wonderful day. I'm glad you
enjoyed the dinner. Your appreciation turns my
labor into a labor of love.
<PAGE>
However, it feels a little too early to call it a day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Er...since we have the opportunity, why don't
we go out for a little while together? There is
someplace I want to see.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
A-a date...? Wh-what are you talking about?
We're married now.
<PAGE>
And is it really something to get so excited over?
<PAGE>
Well...I guess if that is the way you want to
think of it, I don't mind. A-anyway, let's go.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Do you remember the importance of this place?
It's where we promised each other we would
become husband and wife.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>It's strange. Even now that we're married, I find
new things to love about you all the time.
<PAGE>
Being with you has taught me that one cannot
give too much love. The more one gives, the
more rewarding it feels.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I love you, <MYNAME>. I hope we spend many
more wonderful anniversaries together.

Angela, I love you more than anyone in the
whole world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. You must be
exhausted.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Since today's our anniversary, I took a shot at
making an anniversary dinner for us. Come in
and have a seat.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today is an important day, after all. I made all
my most edible dishes, just for you.
<PAGE>
Let's dig in while it's still warm.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It looks like both of them have worn themselves
out playing. They are both sleeping like,
er...babies.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you enjoy tonight's dinner?
<PAGE>
Wow, I'm glad to hear it. You know, I'd like to
celebrate like this again next year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Ah...<MYNAME>? A-actually, if you wouldn't
mind, how about we take a little stroll together?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
N-no, it isn't a date! It's just a walk! Well...okay.
So maybe it is. But it isn't! I-it's just...
<PAGE>
Augh! Enough already! Call it whatever you
want. Let's go!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are. This is the place where we decided
to take the plunge and get married.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It's strange. A significant amount of time has
passed since then, but I still remember it as
vividly as if it happened yesterday.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><MYNAME>...I have grown much, much more
fond of you than I was even then.
<PAGE>
No...I've grown to...to love you much more.
<PAGE>
I hope you want to stay with me as long as I
want to stay with you -- forever. I love you,
<MYNAME>.

Licorice, I love you more than anyone in the
whole world! I hope we have many more great
anniversaries, too.
